sql.value: select ID, TITLE, CONTENT, SUMMARY, PUBLISH_STATUS,TAGS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME from cms_article where #[and ID = :id] #[and TITLE = :title] #[and PUBLISH_STATUS = :publishStatus] #[and CREATE_BY = :createBy] #[and UPDATE_BY = :updateBy] and DELETE_STATUS = 1 order by CREATE_TIME desc, UPDATE_TIME desc

select ca.ID, ca.TITLE, ca.COVER, ca.CONTENT, ca.SUMMARY, ca.PUBLISH_STATUS, ca.TAGS, su.USERNAME as createBy, ca.CREATE_TIME from cms_article ca left join sys_user su on su.ID = ca.CREATE_BY where #[and ca.ID = :id] #[and ca.TITLE = :title] #[and ca.PUBLISH_STATUS = :publishStatus] #[and su.USERNAME like :createBy] #[and ca.UPDATE_BY = :updateBy] and ca.DELETE_STATUS = 1 order by ca.CREATE_TIME desc, ca.UPDATE_TIME desc
